edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.frontend

Class LocalAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.stanford.cfuller.imageanalysistools.frontend.LocalAnalysis

  • public class LocalAnalysis
extends Object
    Controls analysis done on the local machine, including routines for threading analysis, and data input and output.
    Author:
    Colin J. Fuller

    • Constructor Detail

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public static void run(AnalysisMetadata am)
        Runs the analysis on the local machine. The current implementation is multithreaded if specified in the parameter dictionary (and currently the default value specifies as many threads as processor cores on the machine), so analysis methods should be thread safe. Each thread uses processFileSet(AnalysisMetadata) to do the processing.
        Parameters:
        am - The AnalysisMetadata specifying the options for the analysis.

      • processFileSet

        public static void processFileSet(AnalysisMetadata am)
                           throws IOException
        Processes a single set of image files, corresponding to all the wavelengths of a single 3D (or 4D XYZT image). This will write the output to disk to subdirectories of the directory containing the images.
        Parameters:
        am - The AnalysisMetadata specifying the options for the analysis and containing the ImageSet of input images.
        Throws:
        IOException - if the images cannot be read or the output cannot be written to disk.

      • generateDataOutputString

                              ParameterDictionary p)
